snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes an analysis of social networks and loneliness, an interview with an emoticon pioneer and tricks for using your...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes an analysis of social networks and loneliness, an interview with an emoticon pioneer and tricks for using your electronic devices on planes when you aren't supposed to.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Emoticon History and Webby Nominees
